//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//
// [DoD] TMS - Addon ClanTag Protection
//
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
"Phrases"
{
	"ClanTag Kick"
	{
		"en"	"Illegal use of the '%s' ClanTag"
	}

	"ClanTag NoAccess"
	{
		"#format"	"{1:s},{2:s}"
		"en"	"{1}, you are not allowed to use the '{2}' ClanTag!"
	}

	"ClanTag Forced"
	{
		"#format"	"{1:s},{2:s}"
		"en"	"{1} you have to use the '{2}' ClanTag! Your name was changed accordingly!"
	}
}
